message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $12,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and my own costs.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13,000. This is my final offer.
